title: Yeast bio-batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00903G, Communication
Frank N. Crespilho, Ricardo Brito-Pereira, Rita Policia, Nelson Pereira, Graziela C. Sedenho, Carlos M. Costa, Senentxu Lanceros-MÃ©ndez
We present a fully rechargeable, eco-friendly bio-battery powered by Saccharomyces cerevisiae on recyclable PET electrodes, with high cyclability and promising applications in sustainable energy solutions for low-power devices.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
